author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEBBY EXPECTED TO CAUSE MAJOR FLOODING OVER THE SOUTHEASTERN UNITED STATES DURING THE NEXT FEW DAYS...
summary:
...DEBBY EXPECTED TO CAUSE MAJOR FLOODING OVER THE SOUTHEASTERN UNITED STATES DURING THE NEXT FEW DAYS...
 As of 11:00 AM EDT Mon Aug 5
 the center of Debby was located near 30.2, -83.2
 with movement NNE at 8 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 983 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Debby (AT4/AL042024)
